title: Bug Splatting 100 times trying to connect to ranked game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I'm trying to get into my fuckin ranked game and I get bug splat every time. I've ended the entire process tree, restarted my computer, and it still kicks me out. I'm about to get dropped to the next tier down because I can't connect. What the fuck is happening and how tf am I supposed to get into my fuckin game?

replies.body: Do you have Discord Overlay enabled at all?  It could be contributing to the bugslpats.  Otherwise, you could have some bad game assets crapping out the game when trying to get into ranked.  Try the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix that up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3EEidPrz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-29T22:34:19.304+0000)
>
> Do you have Discord Overlay enabled at all?  It could be contributing to the bugslpats.  Otherwise, you could have some bad game assets crapping out the game when trying to get into ranked.  Try the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix that up!

Well it worked and I got in..still lost of course so RIP my team. Regardless, thanks for the information. That was a tad infuriating.
